Html: Has anyone seen and example of how to draw a map reference scale using GMap.net control? It would not move with the map but sit in the lower left corner and update on each zoom event.

Here are a few code snippets for a custom scale I created:

1) Override the OnPaintOverlays(System.Drawing.Graphics g) method of GMapControl

2) Put this code in the method:

if (ShowCustomScale)
{
     DrawScale(g, (int)this.Zoom, Position.Lat, intScaleBarHeight, intScaleRectWidth, intScaleRectHeight, intScaleLeftPadding, this.Width, this.Height, 10,
                    fontCustomScaleBold, fontCustomScale, 5, this.CustomScalePosition, false);
}

3) Here's the DrawScale method:

        /// <summary>
        /// Draw the scale at the specified location
        /// </summary>
        public void DrawScale(System.Drawing.Graphics g, int zoom, double lat, int scaleBarHeight, int scaleWidth, int scaleHeight, int scaleLeftPadding, int canvasWidth, int canvasHeight, 
            int padding, Font fontBold, Font fontStandard, int tickLineLength, MapScalePosition position, bool showScaleFactor)
        {
            double resolution = this.MapProvider.Projection.GetGroundResolution(zoom, lat);

            int px10 = (int)(10.0 / resolution);            // 10 meters
            int px100 = (int)(100.0 / resolution);          // 100 meters
            int px1000 = (int)(1000.0 / resolution);        // 1km   
            int px10000 = (int)(10000.0 / resolution);      // 10km  
            int px100000 = (int)(100000.0 / resolution);    // 100km  
            int px1000000 = (int)(1000000.0 / resolution);  // 1000km
            int px5000000 = (int)(5000000.0 / resolution);  // 5000km

            //Check how much width we have and set the scale accordingly
            int availableWidth = (scaleWidth - 2 * scaleLeftPadding);

            //5000 kilometers:
            if (availableWidth >= px5000000)
                DrawSpecificScale(g, px5000000, availableWidth, 5000, "km", scaleBarHeight, scaleWidth, scaleHeight, canvasWidth, canvasHeight, padding, fontBold, fontStandard, tickLineLength, position, showScaleFactor);
            //1000 kilometers:
            else if (availableWidth >= px1000000)
                DrawSpecificScale(g, px1000000, availableWidth, 1000, "km", scaleBarHeight, scaleWidth, scaleHeight, canvasWidth, canvasHeight, padding, fontBold, fontStandard, tickLineLength, position, showScaleFactor);
            //100 kilometers:
            else if (availableWidth >= px100000)
                DrawSpecificScale(g, px100000, availableWidth, 100, "km", scaleBarHeight, scaleWidth, scaleHeight, canvasWidth, canvasHeight, padding, fontBold, fontStandard, tickLineLength, position, showScaleFactor);
            //10 kilometers:
            else if (availableWidth >= px10000)
                DrawSpecificScale(g, px10000, availableWidth, 10, "km", scaleBarHeight, scaleWidth, scaleHeight, canvasWidth, canvasHeight, padding, fontBold, fontStandard, tickLineLength, position, showScaleFactor);
            //1 kilometers:
            else if (availableWidth >= px1000)
                DrawSpecificScale(g, px1000, availableWidth, 1, "km", scaleBarHeight, scaleWidth, scaleHeight, canvasWidth, canvasHeight, padding, fontBold, fontStandard, tickLineLength, position, showScaleFactor);
            //100 meters:
            else if (availableWidth >= px100)
                DrawSpecificScale(g, px100, availableWidth, 100, "m", scaleBarHeight, scaleWidth, scaleHeight, canvasWidth, canvasHeight, padding, fontBold, fontStandard, tickLineLength, position, showScaleFactor);
            //10 meters:
            else if (availableWidth >= px10)
                DrawSpecificScale(g, px10, availableWidth, 10, "m", scaleBarHeight, scaleWidth, scaleHeight, canvasWidth, canvasHeight, padding, fontBold, fontStandard, tickLineLength, position, showScaleFactor);
        }

4) And finally the DrawSpecificScale() method:
        /// <summary>
        /// Draw the scale
        /// </summary>
        private void DrawSpecificScale(System.Drawing.Graphics g, int resLength, int availableWidth, int totalDimenson, String unit, int scaleBarHeight, int scaleWidth, int scaleHeight, int canvasWidth,
            int canvasHeight, int padding, Font fontBold, Font fontStandard, int tickLineLength, MapScalePosition scalePos, bool showScaleFactor)
        {
            Point p = new Point();
            if(scalePos == MapScalePosition.BottomRight)
                p = new System.Drawing.Point(canvasWidth - (scaleWidth + padding), canvasHeight - (scaleHeight + padding));
            else
                p = new System.Drawing.Point(padding, canvasHeight - (scaleHeight + padding));
            Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(p, new Size(scaleWidth, scaleHeight));
            g.FillRectangle(brushCustomScaleBackColor, rect);
            g.DrawRectangle(penScaleOuterRect, rect);
            SizeF stringSize = new SizeF();
            Point pos = new Point();

            //Header:
            String scaleString = "Ma�stab";
            if (showScaleFactor)
                scaleString += String.Format(" 1 : {0}", this.ScaleFactor);
            stringSize = g.MeasureString(scaleString, fontBold);
            pos = new Point(p.X + (rect.Width - (int)stringSize.Width) / 2, p.Y + 3);
            g.DrawString(scaleString, fontBold, penScaleOuterRect.Brush, pos);

            pos = new Point(p.X + padding, pos.Y + 3 *scaleBarHeight);

            //How many rectangles fit?
            int numRects = availableWidth / resLength;
            Size rectSize = new Size(resLength, scaleBarHeight);
            //Center rectangle
            pos.X += (availableWidth - resLength * numRects) / 2;
            //Draw rectangles:
            for (int i = 0; i < numRects; i++)
            {
                Rectangle r = new Rectangle(pos, rectSize);
                if (i % 2 == 0)
                    g.FillRectangle(penScaleOuterRect.Brush, r);
                else
                    g.DrawRectangle(penScaleOuterRect, r);
                //Draw little vertical lines
                g.DrawLine(penScaleOuterRect, pos, new Point(pos.X, pos.Y - tickLineLength));
                //Draw labels:
                int dist = i * totalDimenson;
                stringSize = g.MeasureString(dist + " " + unit, fontStandard);
                g.DrawString(dist + " " + unit, fontStandard, penScaleOuterRect.Brush, new Point(pos.X - (int)stringSize.Width / 2, pos.Y - (tickLineLength + (int)stringSize.Height)));
                //Finally set new point
                pos = new Point(pos.X + resLength, pos.Y);
            }
            //Draw last line:
            g.DrawLine(penScaleOuterRect, pos, new Point(pos.X, pos.Y - tickLineLength));
            //Draw last label
            int m = numRects * totalDimenson;
            stringSize = g.MeasureString(m + " " + unit, fontStandard);
            g.DrawString(m + " " + unit, fontStandard, penScaleOuterRect.Brush, new Point(pos.X - (int)stringSize.Width / 2, pos.Y - (tickLineLength + (int)stringSize.Height)));
        }
